text: Angélica Rivera Hurtado (born August 2, 1969) is a Mexican telenovela actress and the former First Lady of Mexico. She is the wife of the President of Mexico, Enrique Peña Nieto. She is known for her roles on La Dueña (Mexico) (1995), Ángela (1998), Sin Pecado Concebido (2001), Mariana de la Noche (2003), and in Destilando Amor (2007). Rivera was born on August 2, 1969 in Manzanillo, Colima, Mexico. She was married to José Alberto Castro from 1994 until they divorced in 2008. Then she was married to Enrique Peña Nieto from 2010 until they divorced in 2019. She has three children. ==References== ==Other websites== *Angélica Rivera on the Internet Movie Database *Biography and Galleries *esmas biography and career source *EnElBrasero (Fotos de Boda) wedding images Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:First Ladies and Gentlemen of Mexico Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Mexican voice actors Category:Actors from Mexico City Category:People from Colima
title: Angélica Rivera
